verses.verse: Moreover, the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up and <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house<s%> which <S%H6437>faced<s%> <S%H6931>eastward.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there were] twenty-five <S%H376>men<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H8432>among<s%> them I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5809>Azzur<s%> and <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> <S%H8269>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H3289>give<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H6098>advice<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%>
who <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Is not [the time] <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>? <S%H1931>This<s%> [city] is the <S%H5518>pot<s%> and we are the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>'
<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy!<s%>"

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon me, and He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H559>"Say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3651>"So<s%> you <S%H559>think,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H9280>thoughts.<s%> <S%H7307><s%>
"You have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H4390>filling<s%> its <S%H2351>streets<s%> with them."

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "Your <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H7760>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the city are the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H1931>this<s%> [city] is the <S%H5518>pot;<s%> but I shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out of it.
"You have <S%H3372>feared<s%> a <S%H2719>sword;<s%> so I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon you," the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H5002>declares.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the city, and I shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> against you.

"You will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> I shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> you to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> so you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H1931>"This<s%> [city] will not be a <S%H5518>pot<s%> for you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> will you be <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it, [but] I shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> you to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"Thus you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for you have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in My <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have you <S%H6213>executed<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> but have <S%H6213>acted<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> you."' "

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> that <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%> Then I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> out with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> Wilt Thou <S%H6213>bring<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>end<s%>?"
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> your <S%H251>relatives,<s%> your <S%H376>fellow<s%> <S%H1546>exiles,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, [are those] to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7368>'Go<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> has been <S%H5414>given<s%> us as a <S%H4181>possession.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3588>"Though<s%> I had <S%H7368>removed<s%> them <S%H7368>far<s%> away among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H3588>though<s%> I had <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H776>countries,<s%> yet I was a <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for them a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4592>while<s%> in the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had <S%H935>gone.<s%> "'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H622>assemble<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> among <S%H834>which<s%> you have been <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> "'

"When they <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> they will <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H8441>abominations<s%> from it.

"And I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> them. And I shall <S%H5493>take<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> out of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh,<s%>

that they may <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them. Then they will be My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I shall be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

"But as for those whose <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> after their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things<s%> and <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> I shall <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H1870>conduct<s%> <S%H5414>down<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

Then the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H3671>wings<s%> with the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them, and the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>hovered<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6924>east<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in a <S%H4758>vision<s%> by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> in <S%H3778>Chaldea.<s%> So the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5927>left<s%> me.
Then I <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H7200>shown<s%> me.
